author: dirkv
msg: Bugzilla Bug 31811: [DBCP] per-user pooling with Oracle driver and default isolation settings

author: yoavs
msg: Made DBCP compile on JDK 1.5.0 (or 5.0, whatever ;)) by adding source="1.4"

to compiler arguments.  This can be overridden in build.properties by setting a javac.source property.  There are compiler errors in JDK 5.0 without this source switch that cannot be fixed without JDK 5.0-specific syntax, which I didn't want to put in.
Also made a tiny change in SQLNestedException to eliminate a JDK 5.0 compile warning (not an error) about a varargs cast mismatch.

author: yoavs
msg: Added myself to project.xml, updated build.xml JavaDoc copyright dates, and added comment about JDBC 2.0 download to project.xml.

author: yoavs
msg: Addressed bugzilla 28007, added release notes initial version.
